channel.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
channel.description:
For those who have wondered just how the first LFTC (and by extension, the first BMTC) stories came to be, look no more. For the first time ever, see the humble beginnings of the BM Community GMod comic scene through the work of its founding father, Hot564231. May you all recieve a valuable history experience:
[align=center][img]https://img246.imageshack.us/img246/5734/better19sh.jpg[/img] [img]https://img200.imageshack.us/img200/80/better20kp.jpg[/img] [img]https://img245.imageshack.us/img245/8335/better34fb.jpg[/img] [img]https://img246.imageshack.us/img246/1395/better42fd.jpg[/img][/align]
~~~~~~~~~~
That's the lesson for today, children.

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
mattemuse:

I was banned for harassing Hotnumbers…

Partly, but it was more the fact that you created a gimmick account to do so that made it banworthy.

[COLOR=‘Red’]Anyway, topic please. I’ve said my last word on the subject, it’s your right to disagree with our decision Coll but if you want to say any more about it put it in a PM.

Read full topic

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Too bad he probably don’t remember you at all

Read full topic

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Collision:

And the people who were insulting him got nothing.

So insulting people on this forum deserves some kind of warning or infraction, eh?

Collision:

you fags just never gave him the chance to be.

Collision:

Level, your a moron, I wouldn’t expect any more from you.

Hmm :brow:

Postscript: I was banned for harassing Hotnumbers but it was all in good fun. He was and shall remain one of my favorite forumsers, now and forever. And when I see BMTC comics I will be fondly reminded of Hotnumbers.

Read full topic

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Collision:

You didn’t warn him, you didn’t temp ban him, you just out right perma banned him.

And the people who were insulting him got nothing.

You have no way of seeing what infractions or PMs I or any other mod issued or sent to either Hot#s or to anyone who argued with him, so respectfully you have no idea what you’re talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)

item.description:
Good work. Lol @ the Futurama reference.

Read full topic

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
raw_bean:

I think his biggest fault was being so damned thin-skinned. He just couldn’t take any criticism or mockery at all and flew off the handle completely at the slightest provocation. After all, it takes more than one person to have a flamewar so you can’t simply blame everyone else. If it had been one-sided with people flaming him and him taking the high road and ignoring it, then he wouldn’t have been the one getting banned.

You didn’t warn him, you didn’t temp ban him, you just out right perma banned him.

And the people who were insulting him got nothing.

Level:

That’s why it was fun.
Also, comic was very mediocre.

Level, your a moron, I wouldn’t expect any more from you.

And if you think the first comic made over 5 years ago is mediocre, lets see you do better.

Read full topic

Believe it or not, Hot#'s was a decent all round forum member, you fags just never gave him the chance to be.

item.title: LFTC: The Beginning (Made by Hot564231)
item.dc:creator: Black_Op
item.description:
mattemuse:

Hotnumbers invented BM forum gmod comics??? Holy crap, I am genuinely shocked and amazed.

Actually, Project_Azar created the first ever GMod comic exclusive to the BM Community. However, Hotnumbers then started LFTC proper by making an actual series about the commu ity, and then anyone else with the ability to use GMod followed in Hotnumber’s footsteps by creating further comics under the LFTC label.

Read full topic
